      • getServiceObject

        public Object getServiceObject(String itf,
                               String filter)
        Returns the service object of a service offering the specified interface and matching the given filter.
        Parameters:
        itf - the interface provided by the searched service.
        filter - an additional filter (can be null).
        Returns:
        the service object, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter.

      • getServiceReference

        public org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference getServiceReference(String itf,
                                                               String filter)
        Returns the service reference of a service, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter.
        Parameters:
        itf - the interface provided by the searched service.
        filter - an additional filter (can be null).
        Returns:
        a service reference, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter. If no service is found, null is returned.

      • getServiceReference

        public <T> org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference<T> getServiceReference(Class<T> itf,
                                                                      String filter)
        Returns the service reference of a service, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter.
        Parameters:
        itf - the interface provided by the searched service.
        filter - an additional filter (can be null).
        Returns:
        a service reference, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter. If no service is found, null is returned.

      • getServiceReferences

        public org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference[] getServiceReferences(String itf,
                                                                  String filter)
        Returns the service reference of all the services, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter.
        Parameters:
        itf - the interface provided by the searched services.
        filter - an additional filter (can be null).
        Returns:
        all the service references, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter. If no service matches, an empty array is returned.

      • getServiceReferences

        public <T> org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference<T>[] getServiceReferences(Class<T> itf,
                                                                         String filter)
        Returns the service reference of all the services, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter.
        Parameters:
        itf - the interface provided by the searched services.
        filter - an additional filter (can be null).
        Returns:
        all the service references, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter. If no service matches, an empty array is returned.

      • getServiceReferencesAsList

                                                                                   String filter)
        Returns the service reference of all the services, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter.
        Parameters:
        itf - the interface provided by the searched services.
        filter - an additional filter (can be null).
        Returns:
        all the service references, offering the specified interface and matching the given filter. If no service matches, an empty list is returned.

        Returns:

      • waitForService

        public org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference waitForService(String itf,
                                                          String filter,
                                                          long timeout,
                                                          boolean fail)
        Waits for a service. Fails on timeout. If timeout is set to 0, it sets the timeout to 10s.
        Parameters:
        itf - the service interface
        filter - the filter
        timeout - the timeout
        fail - fail the test
        Returns:
        a matching service reference.

      • waitForService

        public org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference waitForService(String itf,
                                                          String filter,
                                                          long timeout)
        Waits for a service. Fails on timeout. If timeout is set to 0, it sets the timeout to 10s.
        Parameters:
        itf - the service interface
        filter - the filter
        timeout - the timeout
        Returns:
        a matching service reference.

      • waitForService

        public <T> T waitForService(Class<T> itf,
                            String filter,
                            long timeout)
        Waits for a service. Fails on timeout. If timeout is set to 0, it sets the timeout to 10s.
        Parameters:
        itf - the service interface
        filter - the filter
        timeout - the timeout
        Returns:
        a matching service reference.

      • waitForService

        public <T> T waitForService(Class<T> itf,
                            String filter,
                            long timeout,
                            boolean fail)
        Waits for a service. Fails on timeout. If timeout is set to 0, it sets the timeout to 10s.
        Parameters:
        itf - the service interface
        filter - the filter
        timeout - the timeout
        fail - fail the test if there are no service when the timeout is reached
        Returns:
        a matching service reference.
